summary: Adds an Oblivion style arena to Riften!
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://www.mediafire.com/conv/4ab445047ab2e2d3f80227e10eacd99c438c18ba25c695d97ecf0ca84e07f9236g.jpg[/img]

[img]http://www.1337upload.net/files/1Description.jpg
[/img]


[u]Steam Workshop Version:[/u]
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=74158411

Adds a Oblivion style arena to Riften where you can do the following:
- Brawls(Fist Fights)
- Regular Fights(Sword,Magic,Archery)
- Place bets
- Increase your unarmed Damage

------------------
Next Update:

- Voice Acting
- Possibly Quests
- Bug Fixes

Important:
- If you don\'t choose a team nobody will show up for regular fights, to choose a team open the Fight Club Menu
- Brawls(Fist fights) give you Respect Points ONLY
- Regular fights give you \"Fights Won\" ONLY
This means no matter how many brawls you win they won\'t count towards the fights won count which is why it\'s called FIGHTS WON not brawls won.
- If you review my mod please let me know.
--------------
Directions:
--------------
To get there go to the Bee and Barb in Riften and in the basement should be a trap door.
-To fight talk to the Fight Club Master,he is in the barracks in the room with the fountain and mannequins.
- For brawls talk to Alder he is the Redguard with a fur hood and usually in front of the tavern.
-To place a bet talk to Bayard he can be found in the room with bars in front of it.
- To get to the barracks go to the tavern, on the left and right of the tavern are trapdoors. The left is for Surrept and the right is for Bashers.
- Use the Fight Club Menu Spell that is givin to you when you enter the Fight Club to see your rank and other stats as well as upgrade your unarmed damage.The higher your rank the stronger your enemies will be
Enjoy!
(IMPORTANT) if you like this mod please endorse or leave a comment, I don\'t get paid to do this and so endorsements and comments are all modders have to look forward to.
Constructive feedback is welcome as this is my first mod and I\'m open to suggestions
Thanks!
==============
Compatibility:
Some mods aren\'t compatible and cause issues like, not being able to choose team when you enter the Fight Club, and Fight Club Menu Spell not being added when  you enter the Fight Club. I don\'t know in particular which mods cause this but if you experience this issue it would be helpful to find out which is conflicting and let me know so I can try to make a patch for it. If your too lazy to try and find out what\'s conflicting then even sending me a list of mods you have is helpful, If I see the same mod in everyone\'s list then I can determine that it\'s causing a problem.

==============
Known Issues:
So far the only issues are the surrept not giving you the option to fight(this means it will only work if you play bashers) and survival mode putting you inside the bashser\'s barrack when you end it. If you find any other issues please report them so I can fix them in an update.
==============
Troubleshooting
==============
Before posting any bugs please try these steps first to see if it fixes your problem:
Step 1
- load skyrim with the mod uninstalled( you don\'t have to unsub just go to data files when you launch skyrim and uncheck it from the list)
Step 2
- Go to an exterior cell like whiterun or anywhere else that isn\'t inside then save the game and exit( make sure the mod isn\'t installed when doing this)
Step 3
- Load skyrim with the mod installed this time go to the save you just made( should be somewhere outside )

=========

=========
In the future I plan to add:
- Quests

- Custom Armor
- Custom Weapons
- Possible Suggestions
- More!
